price: 17. (Op) deze Dag zal iedereen vergoed krijgen wat hij verdiend heeft. Geen onrecht (zal iemand aangedaan worden). Waarlijk, Allah is snel in de afrekening.
arabic: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡۚ لَا ظُلۡمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: al-yawma tuj'zā kullu nafsin bimā kasabat lā ẓul'ma al-yawma inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
